text:
Local Government Order 2008

I make the following order under section 137(1)(b) of the Local Government Act 1993 .

14 September 2008

J. G. COX

Minister for Local Government

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government Order 2008 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Transfer of land to Launceston City Council
    The land situated at Powers Road, Underwood in Tasmania comprised in Volume 107338, Folio 1 of the Register kept under section 33 of the Land Titles Act 1980 is transferred to the Launceston City Council.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 1 October 2008

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
